Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Label 10 - Warning: Read the additional information given with this medicine

Excipients

May contain

Aspartame

Zyvox 100mg/5ml granules for oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Pfizer Ltd)</ph> 4946211000001104

Linezolid 20 mg per 1 ml

  • 150 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £222.50

LINEZOLID
